brandId.description: Brand ID. Empty if the number is associated to a shared campaign.
brandId.title: BrandId

tcrBrandId.description: TCR's alphanumeric ID for the brand.
tcrBrandId.title: TcrBrandId

campaignId.description: For shared campaigns, this is the TCR campaign ID, otherwise it is the campaign ID
campaignId.title: Campaignid

tcrCampaignId.description: TCR's alphanumeric ID for the campaign.
tcrCampaignId.title: TcrCampaignid

telnyxCampaignId.description: Campaign ID. Empty if the number is associated to a shared campaign.
telnyxCampaignId.title: Telnyxcampaignid

assignmentStatus.description: The assignment status of the number.
assignmentStatus.title: AssignmentStatus

failureReasons.description: Extra info about a failure to assign/unassign a number. Relevant only if the assignmentStatus is either FAILED_ASSIGNMENT or FAILED_UNASSIGNMENT
